CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(ID_Issued_By__c)), '',IF( TEXT(ID_Issued_By__c) == 'Công An', 'Police of', IF(TEXT(ID_Issued_By__c) == 'Cục trưởng Cục Cảnh sát ĐKQL cư trú và DLQG về dân cư', 'Director General of the Police Department of Registration and Management of Residence and National Population Data','Director General of the Police Department for Administrative Management of Social Order')))
CustomField.label: ID Issued By (Eng)
